title: 工业2怎么把分子重组仪的转换电量改变
author: xccxxc018
txt_content: 如题and为什么我在分子重组仪里用铁转不了依  但是用沙子能转换成依 而且上面写的是铁转换成依  我人傻了   求解.

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 曲骑、炮灰
replies.txt_content: 你的是什么版本？我帮你把配置文件改一下

replies.author: xccxxc018
replies.txt_content:
##################################################################################################
#                        AdvancedSolarPanels Molecular Transformer Recipes                       #
##################################################################################################
# Format of recipe: "inputItem:stackSize;outputItem:outputStackSize;energy"                      #
# InputItem (outputItem) format:                                                                 #
# "oredict:forgeOreDictName" or "minecraft:item_name-meta" or "modID:item_name-meta"             #
# New line = new recipe.                                                                         #
# Add "#" before line to skip parsing recipe                                                     #
##################################################################################################
version=1.0
##################################################################################################
minecraft:skull-1:1; minecraft:nether_star:1; 250000000000
minecraft:iron_ingot:1; IC2:itemOreIridium:1; 9000000000
minecraft:netherrack:1; minecraft:gunpowder:2; 70000000
minecraft:sand:1; minecraft:gravel:1; 50000000
minecraft:dirt:1; minecraft:clay:1; 50000000
minecraft:coal-1:1; minecraft:coal-0:1; 60000000
minecraft:glowstone_dust:1; AdvancedSolarPanel:asp_crafting_items-9:1; 1000000000
minecraft:glowstone:1; AdvancedSolarPanel:asp_crafting_items-0:1; 9000000000
minecraft:wool-4:1; minecraft:glowstone:1; 500000000
minecraft:wool-11:1; minecraft:lapis_block:1; 500000000
minecraft:wool-14:1; minecraft:redstone_block:1; 500000000
minecraft:dye-4:1; oredict:gemSapphire; 5000000000
minecraft:redstone:1; oredict:gemRuby:1; 5000000000
minecraft:coal:1; IC2:itemPartIndustrialDiamond:1; 9000000000
IC2:itemPartIndustrialDiamond:1; minecraft:diamond:1; 1000000000
oredict:dustTitanium:1; oredict:dustChrome:1; 500000000
oredict:ingotTitanium:1; oredict:ingotChrome:1; 500000000
oredict:gemNetherQuartz:1; oredict:gemCertusQuartz:1; 500000000
oredict:ingotCopper:1; oredict:ingotNickel:1; 300000000
oredict:ingotTin:1; oredict:ingotSilver:1; 500000000
oredict:ingotSilver:1; oredict:ingotGold:1; 500000000
oredict:ingotGold:1; oredict:ingotPlatinum:1; 9000000000
这个是我改过电量的 但是没用

replies.author: xccxxc018
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-10 23:48
你把你服务端的advanced_solar_panels_MTRecipes.cfg文件上传一下 我帮你看看
已发

replies.author: xccxxc018
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-11 00:00
铁锭转铱矿不是没问题么- -
在游戏里面我用铁转依矿转不了  只能用沙子   而且用了沙子 上面显示的是铁转依

replies.author: xccxxc018
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-11 00:00
建议删除那个配置文件 重启服务器让它自行重载一份
删了重载后的确变回来了   我改电量试试

replies.txt_content: 猜测：你的配置文件被修改过《俗称魔改》，不过沙子转铱不是更好吗233333，去官网重新下载一个就行了
